A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I literally signed up for an account just so that I can tell you all to stay away from this terrible mess that they dared to label Star Wars. This movie is border line with Phantom Menace on its plot\, characters\, and overall feel. The humor was way too over the top for what should have been a darker film. It's almost as if the Director and writers never saw a Star Wars movie in their life. I'm afraid the force is not with this film.
